SELECT PRESM, NVL(PRESSALES,0) AS PRESSALES, NVL(LAG(PRESSALES) OVER(ORDER BY PRESM),0) AS PREVSALES, NVL(PRESSALES-(LAG(PRESSALES) OVER(ORDER BY PRESM)),0) AS VARIATION FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(OBDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'),'YYMM') PRESM, NVL(SUM(PRICE),0) PRESSALES FROM ORDER_BUY WHERE OBDATE IS NOT NULL
AND OBDATE > ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{yearmonth}, 'YYMM'),-1) AND OBDATE < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{yearmonth}, 'YYMM'),1)
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(OBDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'),'YYMM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(OBDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'),'YYMM') DESC )
ORDER BY PRESM DESC

WITH MONTHSUM AS ( SELECT SUM(PRICE) AS TOTSALES, SUBSTR(OBDATE,1,5) AS PRESM FROM ORDER_BUY GROUP BY SUBSTR(OBDATE,1,5) ORDER BY PRESM ) SELECT PRESM, TOTSALES, NVL(LAG(TOTSALES, 1,'0') OVER(ORDER BY PRESM),0) AS PREVSALES, TOTSALES - NVL(LAG(TOTSALES, 1,'0') OVER(ORDER BY PRESM),0) AS VARIATION, ROUND(NVL(100 * (TOTSALES - NVL(LAG(TOTSALES, 1,'0') OVER(ORDER BY PRESM), 0)) / LAG(TOTSALES,1) OVER (ORDER BY PRESM),0),2) AS GROWTH FROM MONTHSUM

SELECT OBMONTH, TOTSALES , SUM(TOTSALES) OVER(ORDER BY OBMONTH ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS ACCUM FROM ( SELECT NVL(SUM(PRICE),0) AS TOTSALES , SUBSTR(OBDATE, 1,5) AS OBMONTH FROM ORDER_BUY WHERE SUBSTR(OBDATE,1,2)=#{year} GROUP BY SUBSTR(OBDATE,1,5) )
